title: So I designed some pendant things
body:
Hello, never done anything like this before so just wanted to see what people thought... be gentle >< I put them up on Shapeways properly hollowed out and everything. Here is a link if you want to see them in full rotating 3d spess: https://www.shapeways.com/shops/FireWorksXL

PS. They are all a midge under an inch tall.

replies.body: Those are rather cool looking.  Nice creative expression! : )
These are pretty sweet!! Gonna do more? Maybe some items like Infinity Edge or some Champ's weapons like Braum's Shield? :D
